de.dfki.lt.loot.visualization.mouse
Interface VertexListener<V,E>

Type Parameters:
V - the value type
E - the element type
All Known Implementing Classes:
DataMenuItem
public interface VertexListener<V,E>

The listener interface for receiving vertex events. The class that is interested in processing a vertex event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addVertexListener method. When the vertex event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.

See Also:
VertexEvent
